subject: p12074041
History: Elevated white count, decreased breath sounds at the bases, question pneumonia.
Findings: Again seen is mild cardiomegaly, pulmonary vascular redistribution and patchy alveolar infiltrates. The lateral film is limited by the arm projecting over the lateral lungs. There is increased opacity at both bases and it is unclear if this is due to atelectasis or focal infiltrate. The overall impression is that of pulmonary edema which is similar compared to the study from earlier the same day.
